body.name: YESTEL 2023 Newest Android 13 Tablet 10 inch Tablet with 12GB RAM + 128GB ROM,1TB Expand,2.0GHz Octa-Core Processor,IPS HD Display,Support 5G WiFi,GPS,Bluetooth 5.0 with Keyboard,Mouse - Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: 【Powerful Performence Octa-Core processor】Looking for a powerful 10 inch tablet that can handle all your needs? Look no further than our Newest YESTEL Android 13 tablet! With its powerful Octa-Core processor, paired with the latest Android 13 system. This Android tablet offers lightning-fast app launching, super smooth gaming, and an amazing multimedia experience.

【2 in 1 Tablet with Keyboard】The Android 13 tablet comes equipped with a Bluetooth keyboard, and mouse as well as a foldable protective case, allowing you to seamlessly transform your 10 inch tablet into a laptop-style device. This versatility makes it the ideal device for those who need to be productive on the go, whether it be for work, study, or play.

【Upgrade more Storage】 It boasts a powerful storage combination of 12GB RAM（6GB original+6GB expandable) and 128GB ROM for faster and more stable running and storage speeds. In addition, it can be expanded up to 1TB with a TF card (card not included) for extra storage. (Please note that this is a WIFI tablet and does not support SIM cards)

【5G WiFi & Long Battery Life 】 The tablet has dual-band high-speed 2.4G+5G WIFI. The 5G frequency band is faster, and provides an online experience with less wireless interference to stay connected to what matters most. Powered by a 6000mAh battery, this tablet can stand by for up to 15 days and play video for up to 6 hours. Easily charge via the USB Type-C port and rest assured the battery will last.

【2-year Warranty & Lifetime technical support】YESTEL has a professional support team with 10 years of experience and we answer all questions online 24 hours a day. If you have any problems with your purchased product, please contact us via Amazon email as soon as possible. After receiving the Amazon email, you will respond quickly and provide technical support and answer questions.
body.description: 【Features】：a.Paired with the latest Android 13 systemb.Uses powerful performence octa-core processorc.12(6+6)GB RAM + 128GB ROM, Expandable to 1TBd.Support 5G WIFIe.30 days no reason to returnf.Free two-year warranty serviceg.Lifetime after-sales service and technical support【Specifications】：Brand: YESTELModel: T13System: Android 13Wifi: 5GHz+2.4GHz WIFICPU: 2.0 Ghz | Octa-CoreRAM: 6GB (original) + 6GB (Expandable)ROM: 128GB (Expandable to 1TB)Battery: 6000mAhScreen size: 10.1 inchesResolution: 1280*800 pixelsFront camera: 5 MPRear camera: 8 MPBluetooth：5.0Charging interface type: Type-CHeadphone jack type: 3.5mm【Package includes】：1 * T13 Android 13 Tablet1 * Protective Cover1 * Bluetooth Keyboard1 * Wireless Mouse1 * Tablet Charger1 * Tablet Charging Cable1 * Protective Film1* User manual【Notes】：a. This tablet only connects to WIFI and does not have a SIM card slot, so it does not support the use of SIM calling!b. No matter you encounter any problems, please contact us at the first time through the mailbox, YESTEL insists on being responsible for every customer and providing quality customer service for every customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little tablet which does what it states it should
reviews.reviewText: This is such a bargain for the price, you get the tablet, which in itself looks amazing, works and has beautiful clarity. Its basically a mobile phone but in tablet form, I wish I could test the sim part of it but I can't but everything else works, wifi, bluetooth, email, surfing, etc. Then this unit comes with a mouse, a bluetooth keyboard, a stylus, a usb adapter, a case for the tablet, usb cable, charger and ear buds. Wow!I bought this for my mum so she can check her emails easily downstairs but if I didn't already have a system I would have one of these, its really good for what you need. No its not the top tier unit but thats the point you know it isn't and it still performs what you need. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Yestel tablet at a budget price!
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is responsive, has a nice display, 6 GB of native RAM memory which can be extended by virtual memory if necessary. It has 128 GB of storage which can be extended by 512 GB if necessary. Battery life is good, not as good as a premium brand like Samsung, but certainly better than other budget tablets I have used. .I do not do heavy gaming and mostly use the tablet for reading books, occasional browsing and limited movie watching. So I don't need to charge more than one a day. I use the included case has a stand and the included Bluetooth keyboard works fine although its smaller size takes some getting used to. I am using a SD card which was recognized right away. In summary, this Yestel tablet provides great value at the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Uses battery quickly, but overall does a good job.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to use for our church praise team choir. So much easier than printing off paper copies of music. The battery doesn't last as long as I would prefer, but all in all its worth the money. I've used these for a couple weeks now. Great little tablet, still drinks power, but for what we are using them for, they are easily charged back up. I just turn off bluetooth and stuff like that when we KNOW we need the battery for longer life. The company had to help me with the warranty, but they seemed very pleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Tablet & Accessories
reviews.reviewText: I haven't purchased a new Android tablet in several years. After careful research and reading through other's feedback, I purchased this tablet. It runs OS Android 13. I hope there is a way for the tablet to continuing receiving software updates over time. It's responsive to touch, loads quickly, and has a good amount of device storage. It also comes with a screen protector and cover. The tablet specifications and accessories make it a great value. Additionally, their customer service team cares about customer satisfaction, and they are very responsive. So far, I am quite happy with my purchase and my expectations have been exceeded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A GREAT TABLET!
reviews.reviewText: I only have it 3 days and it is a 5 star tablet. The quality is amazingly good. The setup was relatively easy. I had a few questions which were answered almost immediately by the support team. The keyboard isn't a flimsy plastic and a pleasure to use. I have streamed videos and the resolution was terrific. It played seamlessly. All this and more for a terrific price! I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice Tablet
reviews.reviewText: I got the 128gb with 12mb version in gray, to replace my old tablet. This things a beast. Not sure about the extra 6mb of memory it claims to have, the system itself only recognizes 6mb. It must be shared with the storage. Other than that it's a really nice Tablet. The price was great. It's really fast & it has taken every game I could think of with ease. The only downside with be the case it came with. It's not going to protect it much if it falls. So I would advise getting another one. I have broken my last three from them just falling out of the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet but other chargers won't work
reviews.reviewText: We got this for my 5 year old as an upgrade from her fire tablet. We love it. Super easy to set up, and works great. The only issue I have is that other chargers we have do not work on it. only the one it came with which is concerning. Chargers go bad. I don't know what we will do if it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great graphics and colors
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a great tablet. It is an upgrade of one that I received as a gift a few years ago. It was also by the same brand. I really like the ease of setting this up. My apps load up very quickly. I usually use it to play my video games and to surf for vacation plans. I use the mouse quite often as it is easier for me than typing. A few of the pluses for me are the included mouse and keyboard. I also use the earbuds while in public and playing my casino game. It has really vibrant color along with excellent sound quality. I find the protective case to be good as well. What I really like is the ability to use all the ports and camera while it's in the case. As you can see in the photos, all the ports and camera have full accessibility without having to remove the case. I have been using it for about a week now and find I get about 7 hours of use while gaming. I know depending on what it is used for will determine the battery life. I like the blue color of the tablet and case. It's different than the usual boring black or silver colors I have seen. It shows a little personality. I thought it would be good to show a pic of how this arrives fully enclosed in cellophane and how much the tablet and accessories are protected with padding and cardboard. The pricing is really good considering all the extras that come with it. I think any age person would be happy to receive it as a gift and find it so easy to set up and use. It is light in weight and you can also expand its memory. I can recommend it highly. It's really good to know a company will back it's products with a 2 year warranty. Many will only give you 30 days.
